name: Vue Task Management App
description: Create a task management app with Vue 3 Composition API
prompt:
Create a Vue 3 task management application using the Composition API with:
- Task creation, editing, and deletion
- Drag-and-drop task organization
- Task categories and tags
- Progress tracking with visual indicators
- Deadline management with notifications
- Team collaboration features
- Advanced filtering and search
- Dark/light theme toggle
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Local storage and API integration

Requirements:
- Use Vue 3 Composition API throughout
- Implement Pinia for state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add smooth transitions and animations
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Vue E-commerce Platform
description: Build a full e-commerce platform with Vue 3
prompt:
Create a comprehensive Vue 3 e-commerce platform with:
- Product catalog with advanced filtering
- Shopping cart and checkout process
- User authentication and profiles
- Order tracking and history
- Payment gateway integration
- Product reviews and ratings
- Inventory management system
- Admin dashboard
- Search with autocomplete
- Mobile PWA support

Requirements:
- Use Vue Router for navigation
- Implement Pinia for global state
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper TypeScript types
- Ensure PWA features
- Add comprehensive error handling
- Implement security best practices
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Vue Analytics Dashboard
description: Build analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization
prompt:
Create a Vue 3 analytics dashboard with:
- Real-time data visualization with Chart.js
- Customizable widgets and layouts
- Data filtering and date ranges
- Export functionality (PDF, CSV)
- Responsive grid layout
- Dark/light theme support
- Data drill-down capabilities
- Real-time notifications
- Performance metrics tracking
- User behavior analytics

Requirements:
- Use Vue 3 Composition API
- Integrate Chart.js for visualizations
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Implement real-time WebSocket updates
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure responsive design
- Add data caching strategies
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Vue Learning Management System
description: Build an LMS with video courses and progress tracking
prompt:
Create a Vue 3 Learning Management System with:
- Course creation and management
- Video player with progress tracking
- Quiz and assessment system
- Student enrollment and progress
- Certificate generation
- Discussion forums
- Assignment submission and grading
- Live streaming capabilities
- Analytics and reporting
- Mobile-responsive design

Requirements:
- Use Vue 3 Composition API
- Implement video player integration
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include comprehensive TypeScript support
- Ensure video streaming optimization
- Add progress tracking features
- Implement security for content access
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Vue Social Network
description: Build a social networking platform with Vue 3
prompt:
Create a Vue 3 social network with:
- User profiles and timelines
- Post creation with media support
- Friend connections and messaging
- News feed with algorithmic sorting
- Event creation and management
- Groups and communities
- Real-time notifications
- Photo/video galleries
- Content reporting system
- Privacy controls

Requirements:
- Use Vue 3 Composition API
- Implement Pinia for state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include comprehensive TypeScript support
- Ensure real-time updates
- Add privacy and security features
- Implement content moderation
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
